languages.text: {n}Все указывает на то, что Ханн говорит правду. Но вы замечаете и явные признаки того, как тяжело дается навигатору сопротивление скверне. Он очень устал, буквально истощен.{/n}

{n}All signs point to Hann telling the truth. But you also notice clear evidence of just how difficult it is for him to struggle against the corruption. He is extremely tired, practically exhausted.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Все указывает на то, что Ханн говорит правду. Но вы замечаете и явные признаки того, как тяжело дается навигатору сопротивление скверне. Он очень устал, буквально истощен.{/n}

{n}All signs point to Hann telling the truth. But you also notice clear evidence of just how difficult it is for him to struggle against the corruption. He is extremely tired, practically exhausted.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハンが真実を語っていることは明らかだ。しかし、腐敗と闘うことがいかに困難であるかということは彼自身が証明している。彼は極めて疲労困憊といった様子だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All signs point to Hann telling the truth. But you also notice clear evidence of just how difficult it is for him to struggle against the corruption. He is extremely tired, practically exhausted.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハンが真実を語っていることは明らかだ。しかし、腐敗と闘うことがいかに困難であるかということは彼自身が証明している。彼は極めて疲労困憊といった様子だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有迹象都表明汉恩说的是真话，但你也注意到了明显的迹象，证明他与腐化的抗争极其艰苦。他已经累坏了，所有精力几乎都耗尽了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All signs point to Hann telling the truth. But you also notice clear evidence of just how difficult it is for him to struggle against the corruption. He is extremely tired, practically exhausted.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有迹象都表明汉恩说的是真话，但你也注意到了明显的迹象，证明他与腐化的抗争极其艰苦。他已经累坏了，所有精力几乎都耗尽了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Todas las señales indican que Hann dice la verdad. Sin embargo, también ves pruebas de lo difícil que le resulta enfrentarse a la corrupción. Está agotado, casi exhausto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All signs point to Hann telling the truth. But you also notice clear evidence of just how difficult it is for him to struggle against the corruption. He is extremely tired, practically exhausted.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Todas las señales indican que Hann dice la verdad. Sin embargo, también ves pruebas de lo difícil que le resulta enfrentarse a la corrupción. Está agotado, casi exhausto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En apparence, Hann semble dire la vérité, mais vous remarquez aussi à quel point il a du mal à lutter contre la corruption. Le navigateur est extrêmement fatigué, à la limite de l'épuisement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All signs point to Hann telling the truth. But you also notice clear evidence of just how difficult it is for him to struggle against the corruption. He is extremely tired, practically exhausted.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En apparence, Hann semble dire la vérité, mais vous remarquez aussi à quel point il a du mal à lutter contre la corruption. Le navigateur est extrêmement fatigué, à la limite de l'épuisement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alles deutet darauf hin, dass Hann die Wahrheit sagt. Aber du bemerkst auch, wie schwer es ihm fällt, der Verderbnis zu widerstehen. Er ist extrem müde, praktisch völlig erschöpft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All signs point to Hann telling the truth. But you also notice clear evidence of just how difficult it is for him to struggle against the corruption. He is extremely tired, practically exhausted.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tüm ibareler Hann'ın gerçeği söylediğine işaret ediyor ancak yozlaşmaya karşı mücadele ederken ne kadar zorlandığını da net bir şekilde görebiliyorsun. Son derece yorgun, neredeyse bitap hâlde.{/n}
